Neith 𓈖 𓏏 𓋋 𓆗 goddess of weaving ⇔ Naht Nähen 𓋌

R24 𓋋 Neith 𓋌 MaNeithu ⇔ 𓋊 Menes 𓋉 Khmin 𓃝 Khmun ⇔ HorNeith 𓇇𓆤 𓋋 Neisse North 𓋌 harnes! IO.Hannes?

tumnun mend menenun tenun nähen Naht Neith (goddess of weaving II) 𓋌 𓋋 𓏏 𓁐

𓈘 ⋍ 𓌻 𓂋 𓏏 ⋍ road
𓈘 𓈇 𓀀 𓏥 𓁐 | weavers | √rotor?
